summary: In the beginning of the Twentieth Century, Coronel Ponciano de Azeredo Furtado inherits the farm Sobradinho in the country, many possessions and the title of "colonel" of his grandfather. ... See full summary »
cast: Diogo Vilela|Selton Mello|Ana Paula Arósio|Tonico Pereira|Pedro Paulo Rangel|Othon Bastos|Francisco Milani|Lúcio Mauro Filho|Marco Ricca|Andrea Beltrão|Mateus Gonçalves da Silva|Enrica Duncan|Maria Eunice|Felipe Ferreira|João Gabriel Gracindo|Enzo Lahmann|Felipe Menezes|Luiz Otávio Moraes|Zeca Veloso
title: O Coronel e o Lobisomem
